text:
Now we are at another temple called Preah
Khan, which means 'sacred sword' and this

temple is believed to have been a University
that housed over a 1000 teachers.
This here is one of our favorite temples.

The reason why we really like it so much is
that it is just not overcrowded.

We've come here early in the morning but there
is hardly anyone here.

It has that kind of eerie feeling to it similar
to Ta Prohm but without all of the crowds.

You can be walking through and you feel like
you're going through a maze.

People who have come to this temple have picked
up some rocks and stacked them into a little

formation and I do believe this has a special
meaning in Buddhism.
